Foreshadow {4}{W} [i](You may cast this spell for its foreshadow cost. If you do, also trigger its “dies” ability when it enters.)[/i]
Flying
When Cathedral Gargoyle dies, you gain 2 life and create a Weapon token. [i](It’s an Equipment artifact with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip {2}.)[/i]
